      • loadExists

        public boolean loadExists()
        Checks if the save file (.txt) exists in the same directory.

      • checkLoad

        public boolean checkLoad()
                  throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • load

        public Board load()
           throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Loads all data from the saveFile "webalesave.txt". Data loading is focused to different line types. Load process fails should a line from the save file does not follow the standard save format
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        See Also:
        saveFile

      • createSaveFile

        public java.io.FileWriter createSaveFile()
                                  throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a new save file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • save

        public void save()
          throws java.io.IOException
        Saves current game into a .txt file of same directory. Extracted info are:
        • Both sides' side, move counter, name
        • Recently moved side
        • Occupied squares' positions with their respective pieces
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getBoard

        public Board getBoard()
        Returns:
        the board

        public void setBoard(Board b)
